entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023
